message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. It's a rare opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to consider this product. However,  $900000 is above my budget for this purchase. I'm willing to offer $700000 for the product, as I believe that reflects a fair value given my current understanding. I'm eager to finalize this deal if you're willing to consider my offer.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm thinking more along the lines of $820000. This is a compromise between our initial positions, and I believe it still reflects a fair value for the product. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go below $800000. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to consider.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While your offer is closer to my budget, I'm still hoping for a better price. I'm prepared to offer $750000 for the product.  I believe this is a fair compromise that benefits both of us. Please let me know if you're willing to consider this offer.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire for a better price, but I'm still not willing to go below $800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'll make a new offer of $790000. This is my final compromise, and I'm hoping you'll consider it. If not, I'll have to consider other options.

Alice, I appreciate your efforts to find a compromise.  While I value your product and want to make this deal work, I can't go above $760000 at this time. This offer is within my budget and still offers you a fair return. If you're open to this final adjustment, we can finalize the sale.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to go below $800000. I've already compromised significantly, and I'm not willing to give up any more. I'm willing to make one more offer, but it will be my last. I'll offer you $780000. This is as low as I can go, and I hope you'll consider it.
